channel.title: Lil help please
channel.description:
My 508 npcs are all great and everything.. im getting better at this coding for 508s, but i have a question..
Where would i go to change how high an npc can hit? because my level 2 men are hitting 30s+, where would i find the code to change this?
All help aprreciated :D
